Summary: First was pizza shaped and the 2nd was a rectangular shape!! Very thin
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Azusa
There were no other sightings in Azusa on or around June 10th 2013
divs: sighting details1)on the roof looking at the sky. 2)it just appeared where we were looking. 3)i thought it was a ufo which it was. 4)1st object was a triangular(pizza)shape and was green\white with small circles on the bottom of the ship and the 2nd was a thin rectangular shape that was glowing orange. 5)me and my cousin were both in shock and a little frightened especially after the 2nd sighting. 6)it disappeared into the horizon.
